ID: CNKWI87_00
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Mohammed El Neel <Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com>
CC: Jamal Alnuaimi <Jamal.Alnuaimi@chalhoub.com>; Robert Netto <Robert.Netto@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-02-20 14:39
Subject: Transfer of Ownership request - Real FZE - Toyota Avanza
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Mohammed,

 

As briefly discussed last week, we need to do the transfer of ownership of the Toyota Avanza-2016 with plate number 55254, registered under Real FZE.

 

For the transfer, the following would be needed by Tasjeel:

 

1. A copy of Trade License of insurer as attached

2. Arabic Letter from insurer as attached 

3. Vehicle number plates handed to Tasjeel

 

Kindly forward me the transfer letter once the transfer of ownership is done. Also, please note that the transfer amount will be reimbursed by the insurer as part of the final settlement.

 

Let me know if you need anything from my end.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000
